entry.title: [BHS/GRA][Data & Analytics] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 17, 12:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jul 15, 20:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our Logs Data Platform offering.

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The public API of Logs Data Platform product will be on read only mode during the whole maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Logs Data Platform offering.
For more information about IAM for Logs Data Platform, you can visit this documentation: KB0071667

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA7][Network] - Network maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 28, 07:00 - 19:00 UTC

Aug 20, 12:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the public cloud region GRA7.

Start time : 28/08/2025 7:00 UTC
End time : 28/08/2025 19:00 UTC
Service impact : The network of all public cloud compute, loadbalancer and routers located in the region GRA7 will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Kubernetes Service maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 26, 08:00 UTC  -  Aug 28, 16:00 UTC

Aug 19, 09:16 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Containers & Orchestration offer.

Start time : 26/08/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 28/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing maintenance on the Managed Kubernetes Service, during which the containerd version will be upgraded from v1.7 to v2.1. Only clusters in ALWAYS_UPDATE are affected by the maintenance.

Thank you for your understanding.

Thank you for your understanding.
